translation.header_search_text: Save up to 60% on hotels worldwide + get member extras like free upgrades and wifi

data.title: Australia, New Zealand & Pacific
data.description: Millions of visitors travel thousands of miles to experience our beautiful homeland. Sydney's sparkling harbour, Melbourne's glitzy restaurants, the tropical rainsforests and Reef of Cairns, Queenstown's spectacular natural beauty and Fiji's lazy beaches are all on our doorstep. Cities and scenery, culture and cuisine, the islands and towns of Oceania provide escapes for serene relaxation or electrifying excitement, often in the same place.

data.title: Asia & Middle East
data.description: Swaying coconut palms and warm, aqua waters are plentiful in Bali, Phuket and Koh Samui, whilst the shopping delights of Hong Kong and Singapore offer a totally different kind of holiday therapy. Experience the cuisine and ancient culture of Siam in Bangkok or explore the modern dynamism of Shanghai's metropolis. Or visit Tokyo, a contradictory hybrid of traditional society and its sci-fi future. Rejuvenate or explore in exotic Asia.

data.title: Europe
data.description: Iconic landmarks, enticing cuisine, quirky culture and scenic beauty. Every European country offers a little, or a lot, of each. Whether it's the royal grandeur of Buckingham Palace, the ancient architecture of historic Rome, the romantic beauty of Paris or the delicious delights of tapas in Barcelona which tempt, you'll find new experiences and dazzling diversity throughout Europe.

data.title: Americas
data.description: North or South America, that is the question. Will it be the fun, carefree, only-in-America cities of the USA that beckon? Or the exotic, sensual rhythms of Brazil and Argentina that tempt? Disneyland, the Vegas strip, a gentle Hawaiian island breeze or New York's dynamic vibrancy versus the tempo of Buenos Aires' tango or Rio's samba beat. Of course, you could always visit both...

data.title: Africa
data.description: Africa, a continent of wide horizons and star studded nights. And the Middle East, an exotic amalgam of ancient cultures and modern industry. Explore wineries around Cape Town, safaris out of Jo'burg and soukhs in Marrakech. Venture into a bedouin bazaar in Dubai or the desert oasis of Abu Dhabi. Discover the natural beauty, magnificent wildlife and rich history of Africa and the Middle East.
